Introduction


BBde Girl (Beauty Blessed de Girl) was a South Korean girl group under Big Star Entertainment consisting of six members: Li-V, Christine, Son Hana, E-Sea, Lyulin and Nanah. They debuted on September 20, 2012 with the single "Messing Around" and disbanded in 2013.
